quote_first: He glanced up so that he could see the time on the datastrip along the upper edge of his helmet:
quote_last: :23. Ten minutes. They walked unsteadily on.
quote_raw: He glanced up so that he could see the time on the datastrip along the upper edge of his helmet: 11:08:23. Ten minutes. They walked unsteadily on.
title: The Infinite Day
author: Chris Walley

quote_first: “This is my first pass,” Wilson said. “East to west, at
quote_last: . We’re looking from the left-wing camera which is running at ninety-six frames per second. As you can see, my altitude is falling rapidly.”
quote_raw: “This is my first pass,” Wilson said. “East to west, at 11:08. We’re looking from the left-wing camera which is running at ninety-six frames per second. As you can see, my altitude is falling rapidly.”
title: The Andromeda Strain
author: Michael Crichton
